summary: Am i the only one who has read the pokemon news and has misread the name of the pokemon region? I'd thought at least someone...
body:
Am i the only one who has read the pokemon news and has misread the name of the pokemon region? I’d thought at least someone would have made a

“Galra region! Pokemon trainer Keith would like to battle!” Joke or fanart. Get going internet. I wanna see some Buff Galra from Voltron cuddling with their Grookey or Scorbunny or better yet with their Sobble!

tags: Ughughguhguh I'm still sad about losing Daniel and Jen
BUT I was smart and posted WIPs to the Discord
And I'll do my best to remake
summary: “We’re going to be our own Rescue Team. Rescue Team....uh....Comedy Trio! Sure, that works. And we’re gonna find out what...
caption:
“We’re going to be our own Rescue Team. Rescue Team….uh….Comedy Trio! Sure, that works. And we’re gonna find out what Campbell’s hiding!”

I had planned on finishing this ages ago (and also wanted to include a picture of Daniel and Jen as Pokes), but between my computer crashing (and losing all of the WIPs) and video games taking up my time, I’m just posting the trio and the lovely tree dad and salamander mom.

Maybe I’ll post some of the baddies (including Mr. Campbell) of the AU in a separate post at a separate time.

summary: Trying to post more doodles on here, especially with this new art style I’ve been trying out! 1. I drew the New Trio as Pokemon...
caption:
Trying to post more doodles on here, especially with this new art style I’ve been trying out!

1. I drew the New Trio as Pokemon (Randy is excluded because the original sketch was just too shameful.)

2. Some sketches of Tora

3. Wuko and Ivan being somewhat dynamic

4. A scrapped sketch of Tora, this was gonna be posted after the Valentine’s Day comic but I never got around to it.

blog.name: ravioko
blog.title: Ravioko³
blog.description: So listen. This is my third tumblr. The first time I used tumblr, I ended up liking it, but got off the site eventually. Then I made a second tumblr and loved it a whole lot but 35 minutes ago I was deleting a side blog and unintentionally deleted the entire blog, so here we are again! I tend to use Twitter a but more often but my tumblr is still pretty cool I guess. Follow me for stuff I do and memes.

summary:
I think the evil team leader should use the legendary Pokémon against us in the final showdown.
This sort of happened in BW2,...
body:
I think the evil team leader should use the legendary Pokémon against us in the final showdown.

This sort of happened in BW2, when Ghetsis used Black/White Kyurem, and it just seems more threatening when this powerful Pokémon is specifically against you instead of just doing its thing as usual.

Imagine if instead of instead of battling Lusamine’s normal team for the rematch in Ultra Space, she had a whole team of Ultra Beasts. Something like Xurkitree, Buzzwole, Celesteela, Guzzlord, and Nihilego.

We may have beaten her before, yet she remains a threat with all these powerful Pokémon, most of which we haven’t even seen before. That would have been a cool end to the story.

We may have beaten her before, yet she remains a threat with all these powerful Pokémon, most of which we haven’t even seen before. That would have been a cool end to the story.

This sort of happened in BW2, when Ghetsis used Black/White Kyurem, and it just seems more threatening when this powerful Pokémon is specifically against you instead of just doing its thing as usual.

Imagine if instead of instead of battling Lusamine’s normal team for the rematch in Ultra Space, she had a whole team of Ultra Beasts. Something like Xurkitree, Buzzwole, Celesteela, Guzzlord, and Nihilego.

We may have beaten her before, yet she remains a threat with all these powerful Pokémon, most of which we haven’t even seen before. That would have been a cool end to the story.

summary: Found out Decidueye's Japanese name is Junaiper, which basically means "tree sniper," while the Spanish, American, and Russian...
body: Found out Decidueye’s Japanese name is Junaiper, which basically means “tree sniper,” while the Spanish, American, and Russian versions, Decidueye, are consisted of “deciduous deadeye” (which for some reason never occurred to me before)

reblog.comment: Found out Decidueye’s Japanese name is Junaiper, which basically means “tree sniper,” while the Spanish, American, and Russian versions, Decidueye, are consisted of “deciduous deadeye” (which for some reason never occurred to me before)

trail.content_raw: Found out Decidueye’s Japanese name is Junaiper, which basically means “tree sniper,” while the Spanish, American, and Russian versions, Decidueye, are consisted of “deciduous deadeye” (which for some reason never occurred to me before)
trail.content: Found out Decidueye’s Japanese name is Junaiper, which basically means “tree sniper,” while the Spanish, American, and Russian versions, Decidueye, are consisted of “deciduous deadeye” (which for some reason never occurred to me before)

summary: Hi there ! I’m cleaning my tumblr from old stuff and making a new start ! I was on instagram lately (for like 1 month) but my...
caption:
Hi there !

I’m cleaning my tumblr from old stuff and making a new start !


I was on instagram lately (for like 1 month) but my account was suddenly and unexplainably deactivated. I didn’t even show a (woman) tit (wich, between us said, seems to be worse than promoting violence (or whatever is way more shocking than a fword tit) for all the internet) !
Come on internet, wake up ! A tit is just a body part. It’s harmless. And furthermore, I can’t even understand why women’s tits are more schoking than men’s one ! I JUST DON’T GET IT.

I just don’t know what it was  about because I get zero explaination. I’ve done stricly nothing except posting my drawings.

Anyway, I decided to come back on tumblr haha

So here is an espeon I’ve done for the character design challenge of december.
I’m a huge fan of pokemon, so you might see some fan arts here.

Made with markers and colored pencils

Bisous <3
